text: is there a way to load past conversation within contacts?
Sadly not. This is a free channel from Slack.

In-case you didn’t hear, the HS dev community is throwing an event during Inbound targeted at developers, there will be presentations and socializing. Possibly :beer: involved. We plan to livestream it so even if you’re not in the Boston area you can attend

If interested in attending  go to :point_right::skin-tone-2:  <#CCGU4R4ER|extend>
If interested in possibly presenting DM me.

Bringing up an old thread here:  Wondering if you folks have used the personalization features of google optimize.

This is kind of funny to be posting in a HubSpot slack, as HubSpot already offers pretty great smart content and personalization, but in my current role, I'm only using HS for the CMS, no CRM at all
Is anyone having issue with the SEARCH RESULTS functionally down on their HubSpot account?  Mine isn’t working and checked a few other accounts and it seems not to be returning results.
yeah we are
Thanks <@U7BQUDTEJ> for letting me know it’s not just me.
<@UA5DFM7CK> can you send me an example?
<@U26B530N6> here is mine.. <https://www.verypossible.com/hs-search-results?term=iot>
i have 2 more that i tested are working.. but their urls aren’t /hs-search-results they are /search
thanks <@U7BQUDTEJ> taking a look
Fix for this is incoming
This should be all set. Current pages might be cached but your example is working <https://www.verypossible.com/hs-search-results?term=iot&hgh>
awesome thank you
Thanks <@U26B530N6> and thank you <@U7BQUDTEJ> for chiming in while I stepped out for a moment.

Has anyone used any type of Event software (like, but NOT Eventbrite).  I’m looking for a good alternative that has a good lookin’ widget that can be embed into HubSpot.

Any recommendations apprecaited.
for the dev community event we’re using splashthat. I wouldn’t be a good person to really give feedback on what I thought of it though
will you be listing the events on the site?
We've used Trumba on some client sites, but I have to say its very basic in the styling you get to do have when using the embeds
sample from a client site (info changed)
splashthat doesnt have an embed (at least not that i've found)
